Interface IEmulatorTask

An emulator task represents a yet-to-be run game that will be processed and executed by an IEmulatorTaskRunner in order to run a game.

Namespace: Snowflake.Execution.Extensibility
Assembly: Snowflake.Framework.Primitives.dll
Syntax
public interface IEmulatorTask

Properties

ControllerConfiguration

Gets a tuple of controller configuration for each template and the relative configuration mapping.

Gets any string pragmas declared by the IEmulator that produced this task.

ProcessTaskRoot

Gets the Task Root for an executable emulator, if this task requires access to an external application. If this task does not require a task root, will be null.

Declaration

Property Value
